name: Fluxblade Sandbox
description:
Chain projectiles through enemies and nodes in custom made patterns in a futuristic fps survival game. Didn't think it was good enough for release, and still think there is a lot more to change for it to be properly playable, so made this a sandbox demo.

Survive as long as possible, play around with node building, will revamp later.

https://discord.gg/XWFnPeSUKH join the discord for more updates.
